title: How to Make Oat Milk

steps.headline: Place the oatmeal in a big bowl then add your water.
steps.description: Let the oatmeal sit for 30 minutes or leave it overnight.

steps.headline: Dump the oatmeal into a blender.
steps.description: Blend the oats on high for 1 minute.

steps.headline: Once done blending use a sieve to get rid of the left over pieces of oatmeal.
steps.description: Place the sieve over a large bowl and pour the oat milk in slowly. Keep doing this until there is no more oatmeal left inside the milk.

steps.headline: Whisk in the vanilla extract, agave, and cinnamon.
steps.description: This step is optional but it adds flavour to the milk so it's not bland.

steps.headline: Pour the oat milk into an empty container then store it in the fridge.
Done.
steps.description: Use the oat milk like regular milk. You can add it in your cereal, coffee, tea, and when you're baking.
